edu.cpp.cs.cs141.final_prog_assgment

Class ConsoleUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cpp.cs.cs141.final_prog_assgment.UserInterface
      • edu.cpp.cs.cs141.final_prog_assgment.ConsoleUI

  • public class ConsoleUI
extends UserInterface
    This Class represents the User Console Based Interface, which prints info, and receives input from the Console

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.Scanner scanner
      This Scanner scans the Console for Input from the User

      Creates Scanner from Console Input

      • printMap

        public void printMap(java.lang.String[] map,
                     char lookDirection,
                     boolean debug,
                     boolean radarActive)

        Specified by:
        printMap in class UserInterface
        Parameters:
        map - the locations of all the entities
        lookDirection - 'f' if no looking done. n/s/e/w otherwise to represent the 4 directions
        debug - if Everything should just be revealed
        radarActive - if the suitcase should be shown
